question: What is the colour change during titration with Na<sub>2</sub>S<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> before adding starch?
What indicator is used during the titration ?

answers.a: 5 day BOD is the ultimate BOD
answers.b: 5 day BOD is less than 4 day BOD keeping other conditions same
answers.c: 5 day BOD is greater than 4 day BOD keeping other conditions same
answers.d: BOD does not depend on time

question: High amount of dissolved oxygen in a lake indicate

answers.d: Excessive aquatic plant or algae blooms
